name: Examination authority
text:
(a)  A reinsurance intermediary shall be subject to examination by the commissioner.  The commissioner shall have access to all books, bank accounts, and records of the reinsurance intermediary in a form usable by the commissioner.
	(b)  A reinsurance intermediary-manager may be examined as if it were the reinsurer. [L 1992, c 176, pt of §6]
